name: Putlestory
description: Vita Lakamaya is a city that does not exist in the maps drawn by humans, and a city where mysterious creatures live. I wandered into Vita Lakamaya, called "Putle" by the people I met there. They were despised and treated as outsiders. What kind of existence is "Putle" for them? This is an interactive picture book that develops from the viewpoint of the player.
